data_table.description: Kaplan-Albert Neuropsychological Test Battery, Original Cohort Exams 14 and 15. This dataset includes variables from a brief cognitive test battery administered to the Original cohort during the second half of Exam 14 and first half of Exam 15. This assessment provides the baseline neuropsychological data used to initially establish the dementia free incident cohort, the number of which was expanded after the introduction of the Mini Mental Status Examination at Exam 18.

variable.name: shareid
variable.coll_interval: Questionnaire administered at Original cohort Exams 14 and 15

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: KADATE
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. This date likely represents the month of administration. All day parts of dates are "15" which most likely are not the actual date of administration, but rather a placeholder day so that date could be expressed as a full date (month,day,year) for the date datatype. This data was collected before the "computer age", which may account for the situation.
variable.coll_interval: Questionnaire administered at Original cohort Exams 14 and 15
